tags.name: auth-controller
tags.description: Controller for handling authentication-related endpoints such as login and registration.

put.summary: Method to change a user's password.
put.description: Method to change a user's password.

requestBody.description: The PasswordChangeRequest containing current and new passwords.

200.description: UserDto containing the user details after password change.

get.summary: Method to get a user by their ID.
get.description: Method to get a user by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve.

post.summary: Method to modify a user's details.
post.description: Method to modify a user's details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to modify.

requestBody.description: The UserDto containing updated user details.

200.description: UserDto containing the modified user details.

delete.summary: Method to disable a user by their ID.
delete.description: Method to disable a user by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to disable.

requestBody.description: The registration request containing user details.

200.description: The response entity containing the registration response or error details if registration fails.

requestBody.description: The login request containing user credentials.

200.description: The response entity containing the login response or error details if login fails.

get.summary: Method to get all users without exposing passwords.
get.description: Method to get all users without exposing passwords.

200.description: ResponseEntity containing a list of all users.

PasswordChangeRequest.description:
Data Transfer Object for password change requests.
 Contains the current and new passwords.

email.description: The email of the user requesting the password change

currentPassword.description: The current password of the user

newPassword.description: The new password to set for the user

UserDto.description:
Data Transfer Object for user details.
 Includes fields for id, email, and name.

RegisterRequest.description:
Data Transfer Object for user registration requests.
 Includes fields for email, password, and name.

LoginRequest.description:
Data Transfer Object for user login requests.
 Includes fields for username and password.

LoginResponse.description:
Data Transfer Object for user login responses.
 Includes fields for JWT token, token type, and expiration time.

expiresIn.description: The expiration time of the token

UserListElement.description:
Data Transfer Object for user list elements.
 Contains user details for listing purposes.

createdAt.description: The creation date of the user

roles.description: The roles assigned to the user
